document_title: Single kidney cyst: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_name: nang-don-than.json_7_How to prevent simple kidney cysts?
subsection_content:
According to doctors, diseases related to kidney cysts cannot be prevented, however we can prevent complications early on by maintaining personal hygiene and regular health check-ups.
Single kidney cysts rarely affect kidney function. After accurately determining the disease condition and considering many objective and subjective factors of the patient, the doctor will offer appropriate treatment options. Thereby, patients can clearly understand the benefits and risks between methods. To minimize risks, you should choose reputable medical facilities with a team of highly qualified doctors and modern medical equipment.
Center for Urology and Nephrology, Tam Anh General Hospital system brings together a team of leading experts, Internal Medicine and Surgery, highly skilled and dedicated. Center Director - Meritorious Physician Assoc. Prof. Dr. Vu Le Chuyen, Deputy Director - Meritorious Physician Associate Professor II Ta Phuong Dung are giants in the field of Urology and Nephrology in Vietnam. The Center's experts and doctors are always confident in mastering the latest techniques, early detecting and effectively treating kidney and urinary tract diseases, helping patients shorten hospital stays and limit risk of recurrence, improving quality of life.
Equipped with the leading modern machinery and equipment systems in the country and the region; Operating room meets international standards; Along with 5-star boarding facilities and high-end services…  The Urology and Nephrology Center stands out with examination, screening and treatment services for all urinary tract diseases. From common surgeries to major high-tech surgeries. These include laparoscopic kidney stone surgery, kidney transplant, tumor resection to preserve kidney parenchyma; Radical nephrectomy; Radical prostatectomy; total bladder resection and small bowel cystoplasty; adrenalectomy; shaping urinary tract defects...
